Protocols/ModelAssistantDelegate.html#/s.name: modelAssistantWillChangeContent()
Protocols/ModelAssistantDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Notifies the receiver that the model assistant is about to start processing of one or more changes due to an add, remove, move, or update.

Protocols/ModelAssistantDelegate.html#/s.name: modelAssistantDidChangeContent()
Protocols/ModelAssistantDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Notifies the receiver that the model assistant has completed processing of one or more changes due to an add, remove, move, or update.

Protocols/ModelAssistantDelegate.html#/s.name: modelAssistant(didChange:at:for:newIndexPaths:)
Protocols/ModelAssistantDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Notifies the receiver that some of entities has been changed due to an add, remove, move, or update.

Protocols/ModelAssistantDelegate.html#/s.name: modelAssistant(didChange:atSectionIndex:for:newSectionIndex:)
Protocols/ModelAssistantDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Notifies the receiver of the addition or removal of a section.

Protocols/ModelAssistantDelegate.html#/s.name: modelAssistant(sectionIndexTitleForSectionName:)
Protocols/ModelAssistantDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Returns the name for a given section.

Protocols/MASectionInfo.html#/s:14ModelA.name: numberOfEntities
Protocols/MASectionInfo.html#/s:14ModelA.abstract: The number of entities (rows) in the section.

Protocols/MAEntity.html#/s:14ModelAssist.name: uniqueValue
Protocols/MAEntity.html#/s:14ModelAssist.abstract: A value that is unique for each entity.

Protocols/MAEntity.html#/s:14ModelAssist.name: subscript(_:)
Protocols/MAEntity.html#/s:14ModelAssist.abstract: Returns a section name according to a given section key.

Protocols/MAEntity.html#/s:14ModelAssist.name: update(with:)
Protocols/MAEntity.html#/s:14ModelAssist.abstract: Entity updates itself by the given new entity.

Protocols/MAEntity.html.name: MAEntity
Protocols/MAEntity.html.abstract: An abstract protocol used by objects inserted to model assistant.

Protocols/MASectionInfo.html.name: MASectionInfo
Protocols/MASectionInfo.html.abstract: A protocol that defines the interface for section objects vended by a fetched results controller.

Enums/ModelAssistantChangeType.html.name: ModelAssistantChangeType
Enums/ModelAssistantChangeType.html.abstract: Constants that specify the possible types of changes that are reported.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: init(sectionKey:)
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: Returns a model assistant initialized using the given arguments.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: fetchBatchSize
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: This property is used when you load objects on screen with lazy loading technique.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: sectionIndexTitles
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: The array of section index titles.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: sectionKey
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: The key on the fetched objects used to determine the section they belong to.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: sortEntities
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: The sort closure of entities.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: sortSections
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: The sort closure of sectoins.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: filter
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: The filter of the objects.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: delegate
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: The delegate that is notified when the fetched objects changed.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: isEmpty
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether the assistant is empty.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: numberOfSections
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: The number of sections in the assistant.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: numberOfWholeEntities
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: Number of all entities fetched with model assistant

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: numberOfEntites(at:)
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: The number of entites (rows) in the given section.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: lastFetchIndex
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: The index of last fetched objects.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: nextFetchIndex
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: The index of next fetched entities.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: index(of:)
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: Returns the lowest index whose corresponding section that is equal to a given section.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: indexPath(for:)
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: Returns the index path of a given entity.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: indexPathForEntity(withUniqueValue:)
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: Returns the index path of an entity with given unique value.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: insert(_:at:completion:)
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: Inserts a new entity into the model assistant at the specified indexPath.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: fetch(_:completion:)
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: This method gots the given entities and inserts them in to model assistant according to section key, sorts and filter user has set, without calling delegate methods.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: insert(_:completion:)
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: This method gots the given entities and inserts them in to model assistant according to section key, sorts and filter user has set. This method calls delegate methods.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: moveEntity(at:to:isUserDriven:completion:)
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: Move an entity at a specific indexPath in the model assistant to another indexPath.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: update(at:mutate:completion:)
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: Updates the entity located at given indexPath

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: update(_:mutate:completion:)
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: Updates the given entity, by given block

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: remove(at:completion:)
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: Removes the entity at the specified indexpath.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: remove(_:completion:)
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: Removes the given entity.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: removeSection(at:completion:)
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: Removes All entities at the specified section index.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: removeAll(completion:)
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: Removes All entities in model assistant.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: sortEntities(atSection:by:completion:)
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: Sort entities in the given section index by sort closure.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: reorderEntities(completion:)
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: Reorders entities in all the sections based on sortEntities closure.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: reorderSections(completion:)
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: Reorders sections based on sortSections closure.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: sortSections(by:completion:)
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: Sorts sections by the given sort closure.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: filteredEntities(atSection:with:)
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: Returns entities that satisfy filter closure conditions in the given section index.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: filteredEntities(with:)
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: Returns entities that satisfy filter closure conditions among all the model assistant entities.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: section(at:)
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: Returns the section at the given index in the model assistant.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: subscript(_:)
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: Use this subscript method to get the section corresponding to each index.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: sectionIndexTitle(forSectionName:)
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: Returns the corresponding section index entry for a given section name.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: section(forSectionIndexTitle:at:)
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: Returns the section number for a given section title and index in the section index.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: entity(at:)
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: Returns the entity at the given index path in the model assistant.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: subscript(_:)
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: Use this subscript method to get the object corresponding to each indexPath.

Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.name: getAllEntities(sortedBy:)
Classes/ModelAssistant.html#/s:14ModelAs.abstract: Returns all the entities in model assistant, sorted by given sort

Classes/ModelAssistant.html.name: ModelAssistant
Classes/ModelAssistant.html.abstract: An assistant that you use to manage the results of an external source and display data to the user.
